TITLE: An Uptick in Elder Poverty: A Blip, or a Sign of Things to Come?

SUMMARY: Jeremy Hunt also put a time limit on energy subsidies, seeking to reassure markets and reduce pressure on Prime Minister Liz Truss.

SUMMARY: Xi Jinping is expected to secure a third term as leader during a pivotal meeting of the Communist Party, extending his authoritarian rule over the country.

SUMMARY: Where the markets go from here depends on whether and how deftly the Federal Reserve pivots from its hawkish stance.

SUMMARY: The Education Department said it was “beta testing” a form that it intends to use to eliminate millions of federal student loans.
